description: An image, video, or audio object embedded in a web page. Note that a creative work may have many media objects associated with it on the same web page. For example, a page about a single song (MusicRecording) may have a music video (VideoObject), and a high and low bandwidth audio stream (2 AudioObject's). Schema.org: http://schema.org/MediaObject

downvoteCount.description: The number of downvotes this question has received from the community.

upvoteCount.description: The number of upvotes this question has received from the community.
